directions: Place coleslaw mix in a large bowl. Combine vegan mayonnaise, sweetener, olive oil, vinegar, poppy seeds, and salt in a smaller bowl; mix until smooth. Slowly stir dressing into the coleslaw mix.
Refrigerate coleslaw for at least 2 hours before serving. Serve cold.
ingredients: ⅔ cup vegan mayonnaise (such as Follow Your Heart® Vegenaise®)
½ cup granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
title: Simple Vegan Coleslaw
